articles.title: One-third of adults worldwide at risk of disease from not doing enough physical activity - Africanews English
articles.description: Failure to do physical activity puts them at greater risk of cardiovascular diseases, type 2 diabetes, dementia, and some cancers.
articles.content:
A new study has found that nearly one-third (31%) of adults worldwide did not meet the recommended levels of physical activity in 2022.
This puts them at greater risk of cardiovascular diseases such… [+1961 chars]
